description: Add and Delete public ips on servers in CenturyLink Cloud.

server_ids.description: A list of servers to create public ips on.

state.description: Determine whether to create or delete public IPs. If present module will not create a second public ip if one already exists.

protocol.description: The protocol that the public IP will listen for.

ports.description: A list of ports to expose. This is required when state is 'present'

wait.description: Whether to wait for the tasks to finish before returning.
